resources.string: This service enables you to instantly send benefits to recipients or periodically or when they need it based on rules and limits you define.
Please select the subscription type which matches your requirements:
Confirm you want to subscribe to the %s service at a cost of %s ?
You have been subscribed to the %s service at a cost of %s
Do you want to unsubscribe from the %s service at a cost of %s ?
You have been unsubscribed from the %s service at a cost of %s
Please select the Type, Amount and Recipient of the Transfer:
Confirm you want to transfer %d %s to %s ?
Confirm you want to automatically transfer %d %s to %s ?
You have added an automatic transfer of %d %s to %s
Please add the Recipient, the Type of Transfer, Amount and Limit per period.
Please adjust the Amount and Limit per period.
